loans.name: Silvia Nohemy

texts.es:
Silvia tiene 34 años de edad, estudió hasta 9º grado, su pareja se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, sus 3 hijos están estudiando y viven con ellos por lo que son 4 personas que dependen de ella.


Silvia tiene 10 años de dedicarse a la venta de tortillas y lo aprendió debido a la necesidad económica que tiene su familia, además vende queso fresco en su casa lo que le genera un ingreso económico adicional, ella se levanta muy temprano y se traslada  600 mts de su casa al puesto donde vende tortillas y una hija le ayuda a moler.



El dinero del crédito será utilizado para que su pareja siembre maíz, ya que tienen la tierra lista para trabajar y por el factor económico no lo habían hecho.


  Los sueños de Silvia son tener una tienda fuerte en su casa para ya no salir a vender, darles el estudio a sus hijos para que sean unas personas de bien, sabe que con la ayuda de Dios y la ayuda de los créditos lo logrará.
texts.en:
Silvia, age 34, went to school through the ninth grade.  Her life partner works in agriculture.  Her three children go to school and live with her.  So, there are four people who are dependent upon her.

Silvia has been selling tortillas for ten years.  She learned to do this because of her family’s financial needs.  She also sells fresh cheese at her house.  This generates an additional income.  She gets up very early and travels 600 meters from her house to the stand where she sells tortillas.  Her daughter helps her grind grains into flour.

The money from the loan will be used for her life partner to grow corn.  They now have the land ready to work, but have not done so because of financial reasons.

Silvia's dreams are to have a strong store at her house so that she does not have to leave to sell and to give her children an education so that they become good people.  She knows that with God’s help and with the help of the loans, she will manage to achieve these things.

loans.use: to have her life partner grow corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sheep for his barn.

loans.name: Ahla Haia Group

texts.en:
Ahla Haia is a group which is comprised of six women who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 180,000 YER from AMB.

Hayat is the leader of the group. She is a 31-year-old married woman with five children. Her oldest child is 19 years old and the youngest one is 9 years old. She completed elementary education, but she couldn't complete her studies. Her husband is employed as a soldier, and she works as a housewife, living with her family in their own house. Her husband is the sole breadwinner of the family. His salary is not enough to cover all the expenses of the family. Hayat decided to help him in the expenses of the house. Their house lacks many food materials. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase food materials for her house.

Hayat looks forward to preparing her house with all kinds of foods materials in order to save for a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase food materials for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a grilling machine for his restaurant

loans.name: Zubayda

texts.ru: Зубайде 58 лет. Она вместе со своей семьей живет в отдаленном регионе. Зубайда замужем и имеет 2 детей. Ее муж пенсионер. Зубайда более 4 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур. Ее невестка и дочь помогают выращиванием сельхоз культур. Зубайда продает полученный урожай на местном рынке. Зубайда хочет купить машину для перевозки урожая. Ее сын будет водить эту машину. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 12800 сомони для покупки автомашины. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zubayda is 58 years old.  She lives with her family in a remote area of Tajikistan.  She is married and the mother of two children.  Her husband is retired.  She has been involved in crop farming for more than four years.  Her daughter and daughter-in-law both help her with the farm work.  After the harvest, Zubayda sells her crops at the local market.  She now wants to buy a car to transport her crops.  Her son will be the one driving the car.  She is requesting a loan of 12,800 somoni, which will help her to buy a car.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a car to transport agricultural products.

loans.name: María Orbelina

texts.es:
María de 47 años de edad, por sus escasos recursos económicos solo estudió hasta 3º grado, debido a que era una de las hermanas mayores y tenia que ayudar a sus padres a trabajar, esta separada de su compañero de vida, sus hijos están estudiando por lo que son 2 personas las que dependen de ella.


María actualmente se dedica a la venta de tortillas y lo ha hecho desde que era niña pues su madre hacia lo mismo, es por ello que aprendió este oficio, hora de entrada y salida no tiene pues vende en su casa y se levanta muy temprano y termina hasta que dejan de llegar clientes a comprar.


María utilizará el dinero para comprar maíz y leña, ya que si compra por mayor le sale mas barato.



Los sueños de María son ver realizados a sus hijos, que tengan un buen trabajo para que no sufran lo que ella sufrió, además de tener una mejor vivienda de la que hoy tiene, ella sabe que es un reto pero con la ayuda de Dios y de los créditos lo hará posible.
texts.en:
María, age 47, only went to school through the third grade because of scarce resources.  She was one of the older daughters, and she had to help her parents work.  She is separated from her life partner.  Her children go to school, so there are two people dependent upon her.

María currently sells tortillas.  She has done so since she was a girl, and her mother did the same.  That is how she learned this trade.  She does not have a time for arriving at work and leaving because she sells at her house.  She gets up very early, and she finishes when there are no more customers coming to buy.

María will use the loan to buy corn and firewood.  If she buys in bulk, it is cheaper.

María’s dream is to see her children fulfilled.  She wants them to have a good job so that they do not suffer what she suffered.  She also dreams of having a better house than the one she now has.  She knows that it is a challenge, but with God’s help and the help of the loans, it will be possible.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Sofiya

texts.ru: София образованная женщина. Она разведена и имеет 2 детей. Старшему 18 лет, а младшему 12 лет. Ее старший сын зарабатывает в Российской Федерации. София более 20 лет работает в заводе оператором электрооборудования. Она очень трудолюбивая и честная женщина и поэтому свою работу выполняет качественно. София уже несколько лет планирует отремонтировать свой дом, но так как она имеет небольшую зарплату, она не в состоянии проводить ремонт. София запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов для ремонта. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sofiya is an educated woman.  She is divorced and the mother of two children.  Her oldest child is 18 years old, the youngest is 12.  Her oldest son left the country to look for work in Russia.  Sofiya herself has been working as an electrical plant operator for the past 20 years.  She is a very hardworking and honest woman and she is a very good worker.  Sofiya has been thinking about repairing her house for a few years, but since she makes a very small salary, she is not in a position to perform any repair.  She is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to buy some building materials to repair her house.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy building materials to repair her house.

loans.name: Om Naser Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om Naser. It consists of five women. They all live in traditional and simple families in Sana'a, Yemen. They know one another through friendship and neighborhood connections. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. 

Fatima is a 37-year-old married woman, living with her spouse in their own house. She is the leader of the group. She works as a housewife, and she is very dynamic and vigorous. Over time, Fatima and her husband purchased a piece of land and built their house on it. This business cost them a lot of money. Unfortunately, they couldn't purchase windows for the rooms, kitchen, and bathroom. This makes the rain, sunshine, flies, fireflies, and bad bugs come into the house and cause sickness for the family. 

Currently, they need financial support to prepare the house to become in a good condition and to be more safe. As a result, Fatima is requesting a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB. 

Fatima's dream in the future is building one more floor and renovating them.

loans.use: to purchase windows to complete the renovation of their house.

loans.name: Corcona Hacia El Progreso Group

texts.es: Fiorella tiene 24 años de edad es soltera con hijo dependiente. Ella implemento una pequeña en su vivienda en donde también ofrece frutas y confitería y en forma ambulatoria en el paradero de los buses. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de mas bebidas abarrotes panes frutas y confitería. Ser socia del grupo “CORCONA HACIA EL PROGRESO” le ha permitido mejorar su economía familiar. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Fiorella es la tercera del lado izquierdo viste polo rosado.
texts.en:
Fiorella is 24 years old and single with a dependent child. She started a small store in her home where she offers fruit and sweets. She also works as a street vendor at a bus stop. She will invest in the purchase of more drinks, groceries, bread, fruit, and sweets.

Being a member of the "Corcona Hacia el Progreso" group has allowed her to improve her family finances. The group is grateful to the Kiva investors for the loan offered. Fiorella is the third from the left in a pink t-shirt.

loans.use: to buy more drinks, groceries, bread, fruit, and sweets.

loans.name: Ruqaya

texts.en:
Ruqaya, a 35-year-old married woman from Tubas, a small village near Nablus city, is the mother of three sons and three daughters. Her husband, an employee in the public sector, earns a low income which is not enough to cover all of the family's needs. Ruqaya helps him with the family expenses through her sheep-raising business, which earns her a good income. 

Ruqaya has requested a USD loan from FATEN to help her expand her farm and buy more sheep to raise. This loan will enable her to increase her productivity and her income.

loans.use: to expand her farm and buy more sheep to raise

loans.name: María Consuelo

texts.es:
María tiene 47 años de edad, estudió hasta 5º grado, por motivos económicos no pudo seguir estudiando y tuvo que dedicarse a trabajar, está casada y su esposo es empleado de una comercial, tienen 3 hijos de los cuales 2 viven con ellos, por lo que son 2 personas que dependen de María.


María actualmente  se dedica a la venta de tortillas y lo ha hecho desde hace 15 años, lo aprendió debido al desempleo que existe en el país, además tenía que ayudar a su esposo a sacar adelante a sus hijos, se levanta muy temprano para coser el maíz y luego empezar a moler y termina hasta que dejan de llegar clientes a comprar, luego tiene que retomar los oficios del hogar.


El dinero  del préstamo sera invertido para comprar maíz, además quiere comprar pollos de engorde y venderlos a las 4 ó 5 semanas ya que un familiar se dedica a esto y le enseñará dicho negocio.


Los sueños de María son tener mas amplio el negocio de tortillas, tener una granja de pollos, de modo que le generen un mejor ingreso económico que le ayuden a su familia a salir adelante.
texts.en:
María is 47 years old. She studied up to the fifth grade. Due to financial reasons she was unable to continue studying and had to make a living working. She is married and her husband is an employee at a business. They have three children, two of which live with them, as such there are two people who depend on María.

Currently, María makes a living selling tortillas and has done so for fifteen years. She learned this as the result of the unemployment that exists in the country. She also had to help her husband get their children ahead. She gets up very early in the morning to plant corn and then she starts grinding it. She stops as soon as customers start to arrive to make purchases. Afterward she has to go back to household chores.

The money from this loan will be invested in the purchase of corn. She also wants to buy chickens to rear and sell when they are four or five weeks old. A relative of hers makes a living at this and will teach her this business.

María's dreams are to have a bigger tortilla business and a chicken farm so that she can make a better income that will help her family to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy corn as well as chickens to rear and sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to rent another piece of land where he can plant more

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a tailor machine for her business

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a 19-year-old student who lives with her family in Irbed, Jordan.

She is in her second year in university studying electronic engineering. Due to the need to continue the semester and pay all the fees, she applied for this educational loan in order to support herself.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Yusra

texts.en:
Yusra is a 26-year-old married woman who lives with her family in Marka, Jordan.

Her husband works in construction, but his business wasn't enough to cover the needs of his four sons.

Yusra started to buy clothes and resell them to assist her husband, and she found her business profitable. She thought she would improve her project and start selling new items such as kids' clothes and accessories, so she applied for this youth loan to support her reaching her aim.

loans.use: To buy more kids' clothes and accessories for her business

loans.name: Willma Nelly

texts.es:
Wilma es una mujer casada de 54 años de edad casada y madre de 3 hijos
Ella se dedica hace más de 30 años a la elaboración de calzados y botas para el uso en diferentes danzas folclóricas como ‘zambos caporales, morenada y diablada’ entre otros, las labores artesanales son repartidas entre todos los miembros de su familia, la compra de material el diseño la costura y la entrega.
Su labor depende mucho de la moda y de los novedosos materiales para la confección; “en nuestros comienzos las danzas no eran tan estilizadas, seguíamos la tendencia del momento o nuestras propias creaciones, ahora los clientes llegan con sus diseños y materiales”.
La confección de cada zapato o bota es hecha a mano y uno por uno, mucho tienen bordados que diferencian a instituciones o grupos y todos se interesan en sobresalir del resto.
Después de más de 30 años de labor wilma logró conseguir un local para la venta y exposición de sus calzados, ella necesita una pequeña ayuda económica para la compra de cuero y material de confección.
Es por esos motivos que willma solicita un préstamo para tener la compra de un puesto de venta y la compra de cuero.
texts.en:
Wilma is a 54 year old woman who is married and mother of 3 children. For more than 30 years she has been making shoes and boots used in different folk dances like ‘zambos caporales, morenada y diablada’ amongst others. The handicraft work is divided between the members of the family, buying the material, the design and producing the final output. Her labor depends much on fashion and novel materials used in the construction. "When we began the dances were not so stylized, we followed the fashion of that time or our own creations. Now the clients come to us with a design and materials". The creation of each shoe or boot is done by hand, one by one. There is a lot of embroidery that distinguish the institution or group as they all want to stand out from the rest. 

After 30 years of labor Wilma has manage to secure a place to sell and exhibit her footwear. She needs a small economic boost to buy leather and other materials For these reasons Wilma is requesting a loan to buy her sales location and to buy leather.

loans.use: to buy a sales location and to buy leather.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es:
Oscar de 41 años de edad, estudió hasta 3º grado ya que sus padres no creían que en que el estudio le iba a servir para conseguir un buen trabajo, su pareja se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tienen 2 hijos que viven con ellos por lo que son 3 personas las que dependen de él.


Oscar se dedica a trabajar de albañil y lo ha hecho desde hace 20 años, lo aprendió de un hermano mayor, además de esto siembra maíz y lo aprendió de sus padres.
Por ser el encargado de la obra de albañilería, tiene tiempo para la agricultura, sale de su casa muy temprano y regresa a las 6 de la tarde.


El dinero del préstamo será utilizado para la siembra de maíz y para comprar unos fertilizantes él ya cuenta con un efectivo por lo que con el crédito complementara dicho gasto.


Los sueños de Oscar son poder darles el estudio necesario a sus hijos para que ellos tengan una mejor oportunidad de trabajo, así como tener una mejor casa.
texts.en:
Oscar is 41 years old and studied up to the third grade. Due to the fact that his parents did not believe that schooling would help him to get a good job. His partner takes care of the household chores and they have two children that live with them. As such there are three people that depend on him.

Oscar makes a living working in construction and has done so for twenty years. He learned this from his older brother. In addition he also plants corn and he learned that from his parents. Because he manages the construction project he has time for farming. He leaves his home very early and returns at six in the afternoon.

The money from this loan will be used to plant corn and to buy some fertilizers. He already has some money so the loan will help with covering these costs.

Oscar's dream are to be able to give his children the education necessary so that they can have better job opportunities and to have a better house.

loans.use: to plant corn and buy some fertilizers.

loans.name: San Pablo De Chauca Group

texts.es: El grupo “SAN PABLO DE CHAUCA” está conformada por socios dedicados a la agricultura y comercio minorista. Edith tiene 65 años de edad es viuda con 03 hijos independientes. Ella  se dedica al cultivo de frutas palta chirimoya para luego expenderlos al por mayor y menor. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Edith viste chompa marrón y polo celeste.
texts.en:
The group "SAN PABLO DE CHAUCA" is made up of members who work in farming and retail.

Edith is a 65 year-old widow with three grown children. She cultivates avocados and cherimoya fruit to sell in wholesale and in retail.

She will use the loan to buy fertilizer.

The group thanks the Kiva lenders for the awarded loan. Edith is wearing a brown sweater and blue polo.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Ana Gladis

texts.es: Ana tiene 62 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Ana se dedica a la venta de pan dulce de forma ambulante desde hace 10 años. Ella es una mujer emprendedora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea instalar el sistema de energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en: Ana is 62 years old and lives in her own home together with her family. Ana has made a living selling sweet bread as a street vendor for the last ten years. She is a very entrepreneurial lady who does everything within her grasp to bring livelihood to her home. With the desire to improve her quality of life, she has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI given that she wants to install an electric energy system in her home.

loans.use: to install electric energy in her home.

loans.name: Om Awadh Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om Awadh. It consists of five women from Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. Noria is 39 years old, married, with seven children. Noria is an uneducated woman, but she is very active and dynamic. Her neighbors have good things to say about her. They describe her as a kind and hardworking woman. 

As the source of income for her family, Noria has sold groceries and food products for many years. She started this business with a small capital and her husband supported her financially, and he is an employee in a public sector. Thanks to Noria's hard work, she has been able to develop and expand her merchandise. The profits from this business have allowed Noria to expand her sales volume. For the purpose of further developing her business, Noria turned to Al-Amal Microfinance Bank. She is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER to buy more of food items for future retail.

Noria plans to invest the earnings from the loan to further increase her business. She also intends to expand her business more in order to provide her family with a lot of money.

loans.use: to buy more food items for future retail.

loans.name: Samia

texts.en:
Samia is a 28-year-old married woman who lives with her family in Al Karak, Jordan.

About one year ago she opened a grocery shop with the help of her husband who works in the municipality. And for the sake of improving and enhancing their store, she applied for this youth loan. Her husband took the picture instead of her because she is conservative.

loans.use: To enhance her husband's grocery store

loans.name: Al-Awadh Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Awadh and it consists of four ladies who live in Hodeidah, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 90,000 YER from AMB.

Fatima is a hardworking woman. She is 32 years old, married and lives in a rented house in a poor area. She is the leader of the group. Fatima has started her business of selling accessories, cosmetics, and women's clothes door-to-door for three years. After her husband immigrated to Saudi Arabia, Fatima assumed the responsibility for her family. She started her business with a small amount of capital. Year by year her business has improved but most of what she earns from her profits goes to the expenses of the family. She has good experience in the business. Thanks to her experience, she deals with her own business easily. Unfortunately, the income from this business is not enough to cover all the expenses of the family, and she wants to improve her business. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more cosmetics, accessories, women's clothes and resell them to her customers.

She looks forward to expanding her business by opening a small shop for selling accessories, cosmetics, and women clothes.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics, accessories, and women'a clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to open her independent store and buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Abdallah

texts.en:
Abdallah is a 27-year-old married man from Khan Younis. He is a father of two daughters. Abdallah works as an employee in the public sector where he earns a low income. He would like to improve the family's living conditions, so he decided to complete his studies and take a BA degree. He started his study in social services. He would like to find a better job in the future.

Abdallah took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies. By taking this loan, Abdallah will be able to do his homework and write reports easily. 

Abdallah appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials and supplies, like fabric and an industrial machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to bring in a new collection of clothes to sell

loans.name: Maxwell

texts.en: Maxwell is a 35-year-old married man with five children who is a cattle trader in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He derives additional income from indoor games like draft, chess, and pool where people play and pay him. He experiences hardships due to his small capital and the high costs of living. His vision is to open a recreational center of indoor games and educate his children. Maxwell needs the loan to buy a pool table.

loans.use: to buy a pool table.

loans.name: Om Yones Group

texts.en:
Om Yones is a group which is comprised of four women from Hodeidah, Yemen. They are requesting a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB.
	
Salma is the leader of the group. She is a 34-year-old married woman with one child. Salma has started her own business, selling perfumes and incense door to door for two years. She earns good profits from this business. Salma asked a loan of 20,000 YER from AMB in order to expand her business through purchasing more accessories and perfumes for resale for her customers.

She looks forward to renovating her house and to opening a shop to sell all kinds of perfumes and accessories.

loans.use: to expand her business through purchasing more accessories and perfumes to resell to her customers.

loans.name: Raeesa

texts.en:
Raeesa was born in 1955. She is a widow who was left with her only daughter to take care of. Raeesa lives in a rented house in Marka, Jordan. 

She has been selling blankets to be able to cover her daughter's needs for two years and found her business profitable. Now she is out of blankets to sell. For that, she has applied for this loan to purchase more blankets as she doesn't have enough money to do so.

loans.use: to purchase more blankets to sell

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is a 50-year-old married man with six children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He has been in banana planting for many years in the rural area. He obtains additional income from his motorcycle (boda boda) business. Julius started this business to get more income to provide basic needs for his family. He is faced with a lack of capital to expand his banana plantation to a large farm to serve the surrounding urban centers and pay his workers. He is requesting a loan to pay for laborers to weed his banana plantation.

loans.use: to pay for labor to weed his banana plantation.

loans.name: Apollo

texts.en: Apollo is a 32-year-old married man with two children who lives in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He has plowed people’s gardens using oxen for many years and gets a salary from employment as a community worker. He started the oxen plowing business because farmers in his village do not have tractors to plow. His hardship is that the business is seasonal, only during the planting season. His vision is to have many oxen to help farmers dig their land very fast. Apollo needs the loan to buy more oxen.

loans.use: to buy more oxen.

loans.name: Sancto

texts.en: Sancto is a 72-year-old married man with children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He has been in the alcohol (waragi) brewing business for 15 years in the rural area. He obtains additional income from banana growing and selling. He started his business to get more income for educating his children and building a permanent home. He is faced with a lack of capital to expand his waragi brewing business and pay his workers. He is requesting a loan to pay workers for weeding his banana plantation.

loans.use: to pay workers to weed his banana plantation

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a forty-seven-year-old married man with four children who lives in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He is in agriculture growing bananas, locally known as Matooke, for many years and now he also started buying, selling, and transporting to urban areas where there is high demand. 

His hardship is high transportation costs. His vision is business growth plus educating his children. John needs the loan to buy more bananas for selling.

loans.use: to buy more bananas for selling.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a 31-year-old married Ugandan with one child, age 4, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He operates a retail shop fully stocked with general merchandise like soap and sugar among other items. More than that, he is involved in farming of food crops like bananas and Irish potatoes. These activities have enabled him to earn an additional income, thus earning a living. He needs a loan to buy soap, sugar, salt and cooking oil to sell.  He is dreaming of having a fully stocked shop with a variety of products so that all his customers can have a single shopping point. On a sad note, limited capital has continued to make him lag behind in the business arena.

loans.use: to buy soap, sugar, salt and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a 34-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda with four children aged between 10 and 3, but only 2 in school. He is involved in the most booming youth activity: motorcycle riding as his main business. And he has gone ahead to engage in the cultivation of food crops like groundnuts and beans which yield an additional income. In so doing, he is aiming at earning a living and also supporting his family as a responsible father.

He needs a loan to buy building materials like cement to complete his house. According to him, the sky is the limit, for he dreams of having a posh residential house although he is still limited by capital and faced by stiff competition affecting his business.

loans.use: to buy building materials like cement for completing his house.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John a 31-year-old married man with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He deals in the motorcycle transport business, riding for another person, along with growing food crops like maize and bananas. He ventured into this business with a vision of earning a living. He has hopes of expanding his business by buying his own motorcycles and having a healthier family. John has asked for a loan to buy his own motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a 37-year-old married Ugandan man blessed with four children. He is a farmer by occupation, specializing in a banana species commonly known as kisubi, farming a raw material from which alcohol, a locally distilled gin called waragi, is made. In addition to this, he cultivates other crops like maize, beans, tomatoes and many others, which has enabled him to earn a living since he generates more income. Therefore, he needs a loan to buy land to expand his kisubi plantation and the other gardens as well. He dreams of having a self-sustaining business so that he reduces his dependency.

The extra people in the photo had also come to the market

loans.use: to buy land for farming.

loans.name: Carmen Lorena

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 20 años de edad, solo estudio hasta 4º grado, está acompañada pero su pareja se fue hace 3 años a USA, Carmen vive con sus hijos en casa de la suegra.


Carmen se dedica a vender ropa para todas las edad en los diversos pueblos, ya tiene varios años en este rubro en el cual se involucra su cuñada.
 
El préstamo lo utilizará para cancelar una deuda que tiene en otra institución y también para comprar mas mercadería como faldas, blusas y ropa interior, de esa forma podrá tener mejor calidad de vida y cubrirá sus necesidades económicas.


El sueño de Carmen es siempre mantener su negocio y poder obtener un puesto en el centro para no andar en otros lugares, así estará  mas estable y las ganancias las utilizará para la manutención de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carmen is 20 years old and only studied until the 4th grade. She is in a common-law marriage but her partner left three years ago to the USA. Carmen lives with their children in the home of her mother-in-law.

Carmen works in the sale of clothing for all ages in various towns. She already has several years in this industry in which her sister-in-law is involved.

She will use the loan to repay a debt that she has in another institution and also to buy more merchandise like skirts, blouses, and undergarments. In this way she will be able to have a better quality of life and will cover her economic needs.

Carmen’s dream is to always maintain her business and to be able to obtain a stall downtown so she doesn’t have to walk to other places. In this way she will be more stable and she will use the earnings for the care of her children.

loans.use: to repay a debt that she has in another institution and also to buy more merchandise like skirts, blouses, and undergarments.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a 40-year-old married man with 6 children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He deals in selling green tea leaves and crop farming. He faces challenges of weather changes, however, he has hopes of expanding his tea plantation in order to get more sales and increased profits. 

Charles needs a loan to buy land to expand his tea plantation.

loans.use: to buy land to expand his tea plantation

loans.name: Alexander Armando

texts.es: Alexander tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto  a su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de 3 años de edad. Alexander es un hombre trabajador y comprometido con su familia quien trabaja como cobrador en una ruta de transporte de su zona. Alexander desea reparar el techo de la vivienda y reparar la fosa séptica por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos, arena, cemento, hierro, grava, ladrillo, etc.
texts.en: Alexander is 34 years old and lives in his own house with his life partner and small 3-year-old child. Alexander is a hardworking man and committed to his family, who works as a collector on a transportation route in his area. Alexander wants to repair the roof of his home and repair the septic tank, for which he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of the necessary materials like: galvanized sheets, wood, nails, sand, cement, iron, gravel, brick, etc.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, nails, sand, cement, iron, gravel, brick, etc. in order to change the roof and to repair the septic tank.

loans.name: Angela

texts.en:
A $600 loan is offered to Angela to improve her business. She is married and and she has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as bread, oils, noodles, rice, candles, and salt. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2000. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Angela independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy bread, oils, noodles, rice, candles, and salt

loans.name: Rosa De Guadalupe Group

texts.es: Grupo solidario integrado por tres socias laboriosas, coordinado por la señora Yareli de 26 años de edad y soltera, ofrece el servicio de venta de fritanga, tortilla y verdura en su domicilio, el negocio anteriormente era de su mamá, pero desde hace dos años se lo heredó para que se ayude con los gastos, el crédito lo requiere para la compra de aceite, plátano verde, plátano maduro, repollo, maíz, arroz, frijol, carne de res, carne de cerdo, carne de pollo, salsa de tomate, crema, etc., de modo que le permita comprar al por mayor. Otra de las socias es la señora Lilliam de 25 años de edad, quien se dedica a la venta de cajetas en la parada de buses, y la señora Gabriela de 30 años de edad quien elabora artesanías de mimbre.
texts.en: This group consists of three hard-working female members and is coordinated by 26-year-old Yareli. She is single and sells fried food, tortillas, and vegetables from home. The business was previously her mother’s, but two years ago it was given to Yareli as a means of helping with expenses. The loan she needs is for buying oil, green plantains, ripe plantains, cabbage, maize, rice, beans, beef, pork, chicken, tomato sauce, cream, and other things wholesale. The other members are 25-year-old Lilliam, who makes a living by selling soft toffees at bus stops, and 30-year-old Gabriela, who makes artisanal products out of wicker.

loans.use: to buy oil, green plantains, ripe plantains, cabbage, maize, rice, beans, beef, pork, chicken, tomato sauce, cream, etc

loans.name: Blanca Nelly

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 40 años de edad, estudió hasta 2° grado sus padres ya no la quisieron poner a estudiar pues el centro de estudio le quedaba muy lejos y era peligroso el traslado, actualmente está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a los trabajos agrícolas y jornal, con ellos viven dos hijos una niña de 10 años que esta estudiando 4° grado y un varón de 9 años que estudia 2° grado, sus demás hijos ya han formado sus familias pero viven cerca en la comunidad. 


Ella se dedica a la venta de tamales en la comunidad desde que era una niña, ya que su madre tenia este negocio y ella le ayudaba,  aparte de esto  también se dedica a trabajar como doméstica lavando y planchando ajeno, esto lo hace para llevar un ingreso extra a su familia aparte de lo que su esposo le genera, cuando sale a trabajar ella se levanta a las 3:00 am para dejar todos los oficios del hogar ya hechos pues regresa tarde a su casa y tiene que ir a preparar la cena de su familia, en la venta de tamales le ayudan sus hijos ya que tienen que cargarlos de casa en casa por la comunidad.


El crédito lo necesita para comprar madera, clavos y pagará mano de obra para la reparación del techo de su casa, comprando esto ella podrá repara lo mas pronto posible el techo y en las lluvias ya no se mojará con su familia, esto le generará una mejor calidad de vida para todos ellos.

Ella desea que en el futuro ver su casa mas grande, que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad de vida, la cual ella no pudo tener porque sus padres eran de escasos recursos y no podían darle lo que ella necesitaba.
texts.en:
Blanca is 40 years old. She studied up until second grade. Her parents did not want her to study further as the school was very far away and it was dangerous to travel there. She currently has a partner and her partner makes a living from farm work and working as a day labourer. Two children live with them: a girl of ten years of age who is in the fourth grade, and a nine-year-old boy who is in the second grade. Their other children already have their own families, but they live nearby in the community.

Blanca has made a living by selling tamales in the community since she was a little girl, since her mother had this business and Blanca would help her. Apart from this, she also works as a domestic worker, doing other people’s washing and ironing. She does this to bring in extra income for her family apart from that which her husband generates. When she goes out to work she gets up at 3:00am to do all the household work since she comes home late and has to prepare dinner for her family. Her children help her to sell the tamales since they have to carry them from house to house in the community.

She needs the loan in order to buy wood and nails and pay for labourers to repair the roof of her house. By buying these items, she will be able to repair the roof as soon as possible and the rains will not soak her family, meaning her family will have a better quality of life.

She wants to have a bigger house in future and she wants her children to have a better quality of life, which she was not able to have because her parents had few resources and could not give her what she needed.

loans.use: to buy wood and nails and pay labourers to repair the roof of her house

loans.name: Majnun

texts.ru: Мачнун добросовестная женщина. Она кредитуется повторно и имеет хорошее кредитное досье. Первый свой займ она получила для проведения свадьбы внучки. Она имеет 3 детей. Двое из них несовершеннолетние. Мачнун и ее муж работают в заводе. Они в заводе работают более 15 лет. Мачнун и ее муж получают маленькую зарплату и поэтому они живут бедно. Мачнун хочет отремонтировать дом. Они живут в старом доме, который имеет плохое состояние. Мачнун запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, краски и т.п. Она надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Majnun is a conscientious woman. This is her second loan. She has a good credit history. She obtained her first loan to organize her granddaughter's wedding. She has three children, two of whom are still underage. Majnun and her husband work at a factory. They have been working there for over 15 years. Their salaries are low and therefore they live in hardship. Majnun would like to renovate her house. They live in an old house, which is now in poor condition. Majnun is  applying for a loan in the amount of 4,000 TJS to buy construction materials such as cement, wood, paint etc. She is hoping for your compassion.

loans.use: to buy building materials as cement, wood, paint and etc. for renovating her house.

loans.name: Wilmer Armando

texts.es:
Wilmer tiene 32 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta 4° grado ya que sus padres no contaban con la capacidad económica para darle mas estudio, actualmente está soltero, tuvo una esposa con la cual el procreó 2 hijas quienes viven con su madre en otro lugar pero siempre esta pendiente de ellas, con él solo viven sus padres y un hermano.


Él se dedica a la agricultura desde que era un niño ya que sus padres al no poder darle el estudio le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra para que él pudiera tener la capacidad de llevar el alimento a su familia, a pesar de que sus padres no lo pusieron a estudiar él les agradece que le enseñaran a desempeñar diversos oficios para poder generar dinero y así mantener a su familia. Wilmer tiene que trasladarse desde su casa hasta su lugar de trabajo a pie, camina por veredas unos 20 minutos y tiene que trasladar los productos que le aplica a sus cultivos en su espalda por veredas muy escabrosas, él trabaja de 6:00 am hasta las 2:00 pm. 


El crédito lo necesita para comprar abono para aplicárselo a sus cultivos, también comprará, herbicidas e insecticidas para tener una mejor producción de granos y de esta manera asegurará el alimento para sus padres e invertirá en apoyar con el estudio a sus hijas.


Wilmer desea para un futuro poder reparar la casa de sus padres la cual con el paso de las lluvias se está deteriorando y desea hacerla de un material mas resistente.
texts.en:
Wilmer is 32 years old. He could only study through the 4th grade because his parents did not enjoy the financial means to provide him with more schooling. He is currently single, but once had a wife with whom he had two daughters. The girls live with their mother somewhere else, but he is always attentive to them. Only his parents and his brother live with him.

He has worked in agriculture since he was a boy since his parents could not afford the schooling, and instead they taught him to work the fields so he could provide food for the family. Despite his parents not allowing him to study, he is grateful that they taught him to carry out various types of work that now allow him to earn money and that way feed his family.

Wilmer has to commute by foot from home to his place of work. He has to walk 20 minutes each way through very rough trails and has to carry on his back the products that he applies to his crops. He works from 6:00 AM until 2 PM.

He needs the loan to buy compost to apply to his crops and will also buy herbicides and pesticides for a better yield of grains and that way ensure food for his parents and to invest in supporting his daughters' schooling.

Wilmer wishes to one day to be able to fix up his parents’ home which is deteriorating with the passing rains and wishes to do so with more resistant materials.

loans.use: to buy compost to apply to his crops and also to buy hebicides and insecticides to yield a better production of grains

loans.name: Feri

texts.en:
A $600 loan is offered to Feri to improve her business. She opened her kiosk in 2002 with her own working capital of $300. She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store like Fanta, Coca Cola, water, beer and bread. She is generating a good income from selling.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: to buy Fanta, Coca Cola, water, beer and bread

loans.name: Imaculada

texts.en: Imaculada is taking a loan of $600 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store such as Sagiko, Sprite, water, beer and rice. She opened her kiosk in 2004 with her own working capital of $250. She is a hardworking woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy Sagiko, Sprite, water, beer and rice

loans.name: Jessica Yesenia

texts.es: Jessica tiene 27 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijas de 4 años y 6 años y su hijo de 9 años de edad. Jessica trabja como empleado en una empresa cercana a su localidad y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. Ella desea terminar de construir el baño sanitario para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios para la construcción como: cemento, arena, ladrillo, y hierro.
texts.en:
Jessica, 27, lives in her own house together with her two daughters, aged four and six; and her son, aged nine. 

She works as an employee in a local firm, which allows her to generate an income for the household expenses.

 She would like to finish building a bathroom, so she is asking FUSAI to help with a loan she can invest in the material she needs for building, such as cement, sand, bricks and iron.

loans.use: to buy building materials to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Esfuerzo Es Exito Group

texts.es: Angélica tiene 32 años de edad es conviviente con 03 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos zapatillas y ropas interiores pijamas a través de catálogos hace 02 años. Años brindaba servicios de limpieza por días. El crédito lo invierta en la compra de más zapatos zapatillas y ropas interiores. Su mayor deseo es tener un stand donde pueda expender su mercadería. Ella cumple la función de secretaria en el grupo “ESFUERZO ES ÉXITO”. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Angélica es la primera del lado derecho.
texts.en:
Angelica, 32, lives with her partner and her three children who all depend on her.   She sells shoes, slippers, pyjamas and underwear through catalogues, an activity she has been doing for two years now. She used to offer a daily cleaning service.  

She will invest the loan in buying more footwear and underwear. Her ultimate dream is to have a stand where she can sell her goods.

 She also works as a secretary for the group "Esfuerzo es Exito". The group are grateful to the Kiva lenders for the help they offer. 

Angelica is the first person on the right in the photograph.

loans.use: to buy footwear and underwear.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: La señora Isabel es una mujer luchadora, de 62 años, soltera y madre de un hijo, quien es propietaria de una pulpería en su domicilio, este negocio lo impulso hace tres años con ayuda financiera de su hijo, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de granos básicos como es arroz, frijol, aceite, azúcar, sal, papel higiénico, servilletas, pan, chiverías, gaseosas, etc., lo que le permitirá la compra de productos que actualmente no ofrece a los pobladores de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Isabel, 62, is a determined woman.  She is single and has one son.  She owns a grocery store which she runs from her home.  She started this business three years ago with the financial help of her son.

She is asking for a loan to buy basic products such as rice, frijoles beans, sugar, salt, toilet roll, serviettes, bread, dairy products, soft drinks, etc.  This will allow her to offer products that other people don't sell.

loans.use: to buy basic goods.

loans.name: Carlos Manuel

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre humilde y trabajador, vive en el municipio de Rionegro, Antioquia con su familia compuesta por su esposa y 6 hijos, de los cuales la mayoría son mayores de edad e independientes.
El se gana la vida con la cría y venta de huevos y pollos, tiene un galpón adecuado en su casa el cual asiste todos los días para tener la mejor producción.
El pide un auxilio económico para realizar algunas mejoras locativas a su galpón y poder tenerlo en mejores condiciones, adicionalmente comprara mas gallinas ponedoras para obtener una mayor producción de huevos.
Este crédito impactara positivamente su economía y mejorara su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos is a humble and hard-working man.  He lives in Rionegro, Antioquia with his wife and six children.  Most of his children are now grown-up and independent.

He earns his living raising and selling chickens.  He has a shed built at his house, which he looks after every day in order to produce the best quality chickens.

He is asking for financial aid so that he can make some improvements to the shed and keep the chickens in better conditions.  He will also buy more chickens so that he can produce more eggs. 

This loan will improve his financial situation and his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more chickens and to make improvements to his shed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more raw materials for cooking and to do some decorations for her restaurant

loans.name: Oscar Arnulfo

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 24 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado  debido a  que  la situación económica era muy dificil en en su familia entonces decidió dejar el estudio y dedicarse a trabajar para poder ayudar en su casa económicamente y tener su propio dinero, él está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo de cinco años que estudia parvularia , en su casa habitan tres personas su esposa su hijo y el.


Oscar  se dedica a la agricultura, siembra de hortalizas, tomates, repollo, pepinos, pipiasen, y todo relacionado a las hortalizas,  lleva 15 años de dedicarse a este trabajo, el lugar donde tiene las siembras está a un kilómetro de su casa, él no tiene un horario específico de trabajo debido al cuido que debe darle a las siembras.


Él utilizara el crédito para comprar los insumos para las siembras, y para la elaboración de un micro túnel con el cual sus hortalizas estarán protegidas de plagas para que haya una mejor producción y mejores ganancias.


Oscar planea para un futuro poder expandir sus cultivos, elaborar más micro túnel para la conservación de sus cosechas, también desea poder seguir estudiando, ayudar a su hijo para que pueda estudiar una carrera universitaria y se desempeñe mejor en su vida.
texts.en:
Oscar, 24, studied until 6th grade but had to drop out of school because of the hard financial situation his family was in at the time.  Therefore, he decided to spend his time working so that he could help with the household expenses; and also have his own personal income.  

He is married and his wife dedicates her time to looking after the house.  He has a son who is five and goes to primary school.  The three of them live together in his house.

He works in agriculture; planting vegetables, tomatoes, cabbage, cucumbers, squash, and many more.  He has been doing this for 15 years.  His plantations are located one kilometer away from his house.  He doesn't have any fixed working hours because he has to look after the crops whenever necessary.

He will use the loan to buy supplies for his plantations.  He will also build a small tunnel which will protect his vegetables from plagues.  As a result, he will have better production and improve his profits.

Oscar hopes to expand his crops in the future.  He'd also like to build more small tunnels to protect his harvest.  Apart from this, he'd like to study a university degree and perform better in what he does in his life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to build a small tunnel to protect his crops.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.en:
A $600 loan is offered to Saturnina to improve her business. She opened her kiosk in 2002 with her own working capital of $200. She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store like oil, Fanta, shampoo, coffee, sugar and fish. Saturnina is generating a good income from selling her things from the kiosk.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business and she is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: to buy oil, Fanta, shampoo, coffee, sugar and fish

loans.name: Ruhsora

texts.ru: Рухсора женщина с прекрасной душой и прекрасными мыслями. Она очень добрая женщина и воспитывает одного ребенка. Ее муж Содир всегда старается помогать ей введению ее бизнеса, так как она более 11 лет занимается купле продажей детской одежды. Она покупает оптом и реализует в розницу на местном рынке. Рухсора каждый сезон обновляет ассортимент своего товара и таким образом она привлекает покупателей. Рухсора имеет достаточного опыта, чтобы сделать индивидуальный подход каждому покупателю. Рухсора запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки детской одежды для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Ruhsora is a woman with a beautiful soul and lovely thoughts. She is a very kind woman and is raising a child. Her husband, Sodir, always tries to help her run her business. She has more than eleven years of experience buying and selling children's clothing. She buys wholesale and sells retail in the local market. Ruhsora updates her inventory every season and thus attracts customers. Ruhsora has enough experience to approach each customer individually. Ruhsora is requesting a loan of 5000 KGS to buy children's clothes for the new season. She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: buy children's clothes for resale.

loans.name: Shahry

texts.ru: Шахри 58 лет. Она вдова и имеет 2 детей. Шахри имеет медицинское образование. Она более 30 лет работает в местной больнице как медсестра. Она имеет огромный стаж работы. Ее коллеги знают ее добросовестную и честную женщину и уважают ее. Шахри данное время серьёзно больна, и врачи должны сделать ей операцию. Однако она не имеет денег. Шахри запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони, чтобы сделать операцию. Она нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shahry is 58 years old. She is a widow and has two children. Shahri has a medical education. She spent more than thirty years working in a local hospital as a nurse. She has great work experience. Her colleagues know her to be a diligent and honest woman, and they respect her. Shahry is seriously ill, and she needs surgery. However, she has no money. Shahry is asking for a loan of 10,000 TJS to pay for the operation. She needs your kindness and is waiting for it.

loans.use: pay for surgery.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan.

She has restarted her food vending business and is now requesting a PHP 9,950 housing loan through NWTF in order to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor so she can build a house for her family.

With your help Annabelle will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Annabelle would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Domingas

texts.en:
Domingas is taking out a loan of $600 to improve her business. She runs a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. 

She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as noodles, oils, fanta, coca-cola, body cream and water. She opened her kiosk in 2004  with her own working capital of $400.  

She is a hardworking woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future

loans.use: To buy noodles, oils, fanta, coca-cola, body cream and water for her shop

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores is 49 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Dolores' business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. She has restarted her fishing business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Dolores has taken a PHP 8,550 housing loan through NWTF in order to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using the loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Dolores is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and in the future, would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Donna

texts.en:
Donna is 32 years old and has two children. She is married and both of her children are in school.

Donna and her family survived Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

She is taking a housing loan of PHP 9,678 to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Donna has been with NWTF borrower since 2012 and plans to recover through her fishing business.

With your help, Donna can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of Super Typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is now applying for a loan of $1,000 to improve her business. She opened her kiosk in 2009 with her own working capital of $600, and she earns a good income from her business.

She will use her loan to buy some stocks to keep in her store such as beer, eggs, noodles, fish, cigarettes, oils, body cream, shampoo and sugar. She is a very hardworking woman and doing business has been her regular activity for the past 5 years. 

She wants to make her business bigger and improve her living conditions in the future.

loans.use: To buy beer, eggs, noodles, fish, cigarettes, oils, body cream, shampoo and sugar

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es: Con 57 años de edad Antonio se dedica a su negocio que es una electrica donde ofrece cercas electricas, alarmanas entre otros productos, son 5 años que tiene su negocio con este puede educar a sus 2 hijos, el credito lo v a  ainvertir en la compra de mercaderia en alarmas y cercas electricas para ofrecerlas y venderlo a sus clientes, Antonio comenta que le va bien en su negocio ya que es una provincia ganadera y lo que mas le compran es cercas electricas para el ganado,  Antonio aspira variar mas productos y mejoras su negocio para que sus hijos terminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Antonio, 57, has been in the electrical products business for five years, selling electric fences, alarm systems and other products.  With the income he makes he is able to educate his two children.  He plans to use the loan to buy alarm and electric fence merchandise to sell to his customers.

Antonio says business is going well because it is a livestock farming area and electric fencing is his most popular product.  He wants to sell a wider variety of products and improve his business so his children can finish their education.

loans.use: To buy electric fences.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Fatima is 38 years old and two of her children are in school.

Fatima's house was destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. She has restarted her pig-fattening business and is committed to regaining what she lost. Fatima is taking out a PHP 9,714 housing loan through NWTF in order to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family.

Fatima has been with NWTF since 2013 in her pursuit to rise out of poverty. With your help, she will be able to start once more in a new home. In the future, Fatima would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Maria Dolly

texts.es:
María es una  mujer luchadora que por cuestiones de la vida no ha tenido muchas oportunidades laborales que le permitan generar recursos para ayudar en su humilde hogar o incluso para darse un gusto que tanto les gusta a las personas, debido a esto inicio una venta de mercancía de productos de uso personales buscando generar recursos que le permitieran satisfaces las necesidades de su familia y comprar algunos caprichos para ella.
Como empresaria en crecimiento se le presentan problemas económicos ya que su familia e hijo el demandan gastos es por esto que quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de mercancía por catálogo  buscando una mejor estabilidad económica y un volumen de clientes, soñando con poder montar un almacén.
texts.en:
María is a hard-working woman who has not had many opportunities in life to generate enough resources to provide for her humble household or even to enjoy the smallest pleasures in life.  Therefore she started selling personal care products in an effort to earn enough to satisfy the needs of her family and be able to buy things for herself.

As a developing entrepreneur, she runs into economic problems when it comes to covering family costs and her son's needs.  So she is requesting a loan to buy merchandise by catalogue in an effort to attract more customers and improve her economy.  Her dream is to open a shop one day.

loans.use: To buy products by catalogue to increase sales volume and improve her economy.

loans.name: Wilson Emilio

texts.es: Emilio es un joven que gracias a su creatividad tiene un negocio que le va muy bien, Emilio juntamente con su madre se dedica a la venta de parrilladas, sopas, aguas, dulces con cuajada y demas productos que son muy llamativos para personas de su localidad y para las personas turistas, en sus tiempos libres Emilio se dedica a estudiar, el credito lo va  a invertir en la compra de frutas, cuajadas y carnes y de ser posible un horno para prepar los productos y que sean con un sabor mas exquisito, Emilio aspira seguir adelante con su negocio y en lo posible mejorarlo para que sus ingresos le permitan pagar los gastos que implica sus estudio.
texts.en:
Emilio is a young man who is running a very successful business thanks to his creativity.  He and his mother sell grilled goods, soups, water, sweets such as custard and other outstanding products to people in their town and to visiting tourists.  In his free time Emilio studies.  He will use the loan to buy fruits, custards and meats, and possibly an oven to prepare his products so they will taste better.

Emilio wants to grow and improve his business so he can earn enough to cover his education costs.

loans.use: To buy fruits and meats.

loans.name: Luz Consuelo

texts.es:
Luz aprendió del oficio de confección gracias a sus hermanos mayores quienes siempre le enseñaron y la acompañaron en su proceso de aprendizaje.
Desde hace 9 años viene ejerciendo esta actividad de manera independiente en un taller que monto en su propia casa.
Ella es muy dedicada y todos los días trabaja en su taller.
Actualmente labora en contratación con terceros y elabora diferentes prendas y uniformes.
Ella solicita el crédito para comprar una maquina fileteadora con puntada de seguridad que le permita mejorar su nivel de producción y a través de este su nivel de vida y el de sus hijos.
Su mayor sueño es poder seguir creciendo como empresaria y como persona.
texts.en:
Luz learned how to sew from her elder siblings who were beside her during the learning process.  For nine years she has been working independently out of a sewing shop she set up in her own home.  She is very dedicated and works every day in her shop.

She currently works as a contractor making different kinds of clothing and uniforms.  The loan she is requesting is to buy an overlock sewing machine so she can improve her production quality.  This will improve her lifestyle and that of her children.

Her greatest dream is to continue growing as a business owner and on a personal level.

loans.use: To buy an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by Super Typhoon Haiyan.

She has restarted her fishing business and is now requesting a PHP 9,635 housing loan through NWTF in order to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor so she can build a house for her family.

With your help, Gina will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Amparo Del Socorro

texts.es: Amparo una mujer de 59 años de edad que dio toda su vida en beneficio de su familia ayudándola a salir adelante y superando juntos las adversidades que se les han presentado en la vida, gracias a una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo, paciencia y sacrificio logro montar ha generado los ingresos para el sostenimiento de la familia y buscando ser la mejor empresa familiar del sector quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de insumos que le permitan aumentar su inventario de venta ofertando productos que los clientes le ha pedido como ciertas marcas de productos de la canasta familiar, y cree que este crédito será la gran oportunidad para despegar y consolidarse como la tienda más solicitada en el barrio.
texts.en: Amparo, 59, has dedicated her life to helping her family get ahead and overcome all of life's adversity.  Thanks to her store, which took much effort, patience and sacrifice to establish, she has earned enough to support the family.  In an effort to become a better family business in the sector she is requesting a loan to buy supplies to increase her inventory and offer brands and foods that customers are interested in.  She feels this loan will give her the opportunity to move forward and consolidate her store as one of the most popular in the neighborhood.

loans.use: To buy food products to meet customer demand.

loans.name: Madalena

texts.en: Madalena is taking a loan of $1,000 to improve her business. She is running a mini shop that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as  trousers, shorts, shirts, long sleeve and short sleeve. She opened her mini shop a year ago with her own working capital of $200.  Madalena is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future

loans.use: To buy trousers, shorts and shirts

loans.name: Ines

texts.en: Ines is taking a loan of $1,500 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as spoons, plates, pots, buckets, cups and bowls. She opened her kiosk in 2002 with her own working capital of $1,000. Ines is a hardworking woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy spoons, plates, pots, buckets, cups and bowls

loans.name: Amgalanbaatar

texts.en: Mr. Amgalanbaatar, 29 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been rendering taxi services to local people since 2012. His wife is a saleswoman at a trade center. Their son is three years old and stays in kindergarten. The house his family lives in has been deteriorating over the years, so he is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cements, planks and fiberglass for house renovation. In winter, his house quickly loses its heat so his family burns lots of coal in order to not to freeze. House renovation will increase the heat-preserving capacity of the house and reduce coal usage, thus contributing to the clean air efforts.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Sophea

texts.en:
Sophea, 39 years old, is a father of two schoolchildren. He lives in a rural area of Battambang District, Battambang Province, Cambodia. To make a living, he works as a Tuk Tuk driver. Until now, it has been almost five years that he has been involved in this career, which allows him to make USD 10 per day.

Sophea would like to get a loan from HKL. This is his first loan and he will use it to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of his family members. Sophea thanks lenders for the financial support via HKL, which provides him with a much lower interest rate than the general loan products.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 36 years old and has two children. Josephine is married and both of her children are in school.

Josephine and her family survived Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Josephine is taking a housing loan of PHP 9,757 to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Josephine has been with NWTF as a borrower since 2011. She plans to recover through her fishing business.

With your help, Josephine can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of Super Typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 55 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Josephine's business and family home was destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. She has restarted her food vending business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Josephine has taken a PHP 9,714 housing loan through NWTF in order to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Josephine is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and in the future, would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Jelene

texts.en:
Jelene is 32 years old and married with one kid who is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Jelene's business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. She has restarted her fishing business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Jelene has taken a PHP 7,000 housing loan through NWTF in order to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Jelene is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and in the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Tsogzolmaa

texts.en:
Mrs. Tsogzolmaa, aged 59, lives alone in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has three daughters and two of them are in a foreign country and the other one is married, living in a different house. 

Tsogzolmaa runs a grocery store and gets a retirement pension from the state. With her previous loan, she managed to renovate her house. But due to heavy rainfall, the house ceilings have become deformed, and the floors and walls were damaged badly. So she is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy shingles, wallpaper and hardwood floors in order to repair the damaged parts. After the repairs, she will live in comfort.

loans.use: to repair damaged parts of her house.

loans.name: Analita

texts.en:
Analita is 22 years old with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

She has business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines. Analita has been in this business for two years. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell.

In the future, Analita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: purchase more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Mariame

texts.fr:
Madame MARIAME  est âgée de 60 ans, elle vit dans une grande famille dans la ville  de Koutiala. Elle a plus de 20ans d’expérience dans les activités commerciales qui sont  basées sur  l’achat-vente de bazin, Jus  de fruits et la teinture.    
Pour  pouvoir constituer un stock ses matières premières et  augmenter son chiffre d’affaire, elle décide de  rejoindre l‘institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso pour la première fois.
Avec ce prêt  elle compte acheter  de fruits, sucre, jus en vu de les transformer en boisson, et acheter de  bazin et  des  produits nécessaires pour la teinture. 
 Elle s’approvisionne à Koutiala et  Bamako, effectue sa vente dans des différentes foires hebdomadaires à  une clientèle mixte.
Elle compte  réaliser un profit de 40.000FCFA par mois, qu’elle utilisera  pour  le remboursement des intérêts de Soro Yiriwaso, subvenir à ses besoins et investir le reste dans  son activité. 
Elle compte toujours sur les financements  de Soro Yiriwaso pour l’agrandissement et la diversification de son activité.
texts.en:
Mariame is 60 years old and lives in a large family in the town of Koutiala. She has more than twenty years experience selling such items as bazin fabric, fruit juice, and dye. 

To be able to build up her stock and increase her turnover, she decided to join the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso for the first time.

With this loan, she plans to buy fruits, sugar, and juice to make drinks, bazin fabric, and the goods needed to make dye. She procures her goods in Koutiala and Bamako.

Mariame makes her sales at various weekly markets to a mixed group of customers. She hopes to earn a profit of 40,000 francs CFA per month, which she will use to pay back Soro Yirwaso's interest and support her needs. She will invest the rest back into her business.

She counts on Soro Yirwaso's financing to [help her] expand and diversify her business.

loans.use: to buy various goods

loans.name: Son

texts.en:
Son is 60 years old and a father of five children. He lives in a rural area of Prey Chhor District, Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. To make a living, he works as a farmer in a small rice field near his house. He has been involved in the farming business for more than 40 years, and it allows him to make US $3 per day.

For supplementary income, Son would like to get loan from HKL to buy a tuk tuk for his son to drive for passengers in the city. He hopes that the tuk tuk will help to promote his family income. This will be his fourth loan.  

Son would like to thank lenders for their financial support via HKL, which provides him with a much lower interest rate than its general loan product.

loans.use: to buy a tuk tuk.

loans.name: Mahamadou

texts.fr: Mr Mahamadou est âgé de 26 ans, marié et père d’un enfant. Depuis plus de 7ans Mr Mahamadou exerce les activités commerciales basées sur l’achat et vente d’intrants agricoles, aliments bétail, Céréales, insecticides, des engrais dans son magasin situé dans la ville de Koutiala. Cette activité lui procure assez de revenu, car il reçoit beaucoup de clients par jour surtout  en ce moment d’hivernage. Pour la bonne satisfaction de sa clientèle et l’agrandissement de son activité, Mahamadou a fait recours à l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso pour la première fois. Ce prêt sera utilisé pour achat d’Intrants agricoles aliments bétail, Céréales, insecticides. Il s’approvisionne à Koutiala  et effectue sa vente dans son magasin  à une clientèle mixte. Avec l’agrandissement de son activité, monsieur compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 140 000 FCFA qu’il utilisera pour le remboursement de son prêt, satisfaire les  besoins de sa famille et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Mahamadou is 26 years old, married, and a father of one child. For more than seven years, he has been buying and selling farm inputs, animal feed, cereals, insecticides, and fertilizers in a shop situated in the town of Koutiala.

He is able to earn enough with this business, because he receives new clients every day, especially now during the rainy season.

To satisfy his customers and increase his business, Mahamadou has joined the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso for the first time. This loan will be used to buy farm inputs, animal feed, cereals, and insecticides. He procures his goods in Koutiala and makes his sales in his shop to a mixed group of customers.

With an increase in business, Mahamadou hopes to earn a monthly profit of 140,000 francs CFA, which he will use to pay back his loan and take care of his family. He will reinvest the rest into his business.

loans.use: to buy various goods

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is married with 4 children. She is 40 years old and lives in Silanga, Tangub City.

To earn a living, Merlyn accepts laundry services. She has been doing this for three years. Merlyn sees good opportunities doing this type of business. She requested a new loan to purchase detergents, fabric conditioner, basins and tubs.  

Merlyn has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Merlyn hopes to increase and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase detergents, fabric conditioner, basins and tubs

loans.name: Haide

texts.en:
Haide is married with six children. She is 44 years old and lives in Purok 2, Silanga, Tangub City. To earn a living, Haide has a fishing business. She has had this business for almost three years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 8,000.

Haide has been a member of PMPC for two years. For the new semester, she applied for a loan to pay for the tuition fees of her daughter.

In the future, Haide hopes to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to pay for the tuition fees of her daughter.

loans.name: Eufracio

texts.en: Eufracio is 62 years old and married with three beautiful children. He's been a carpenter for almost four decades and has gathered lots of experience in this kind of business. He has been one of the best carpenters in the area with his good output production. With this kind of business, which he is good at, he has gathered lots of customers and has been referred to other people because of his good work. With more orders to create tables, chairs and cabinets, he needs more money to buy more supplies for his projects. This is why Eufracio wants to apply for a loan from Paglaum to help him meet his quota.

loans.use: To buy new construction supplies to make tables, chairs, and cabinets

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 56 years old and lives in Becor Jimenez, Philippines. She is married with four children.
 
Virginia works in the fishing industry and sells fish for a living. She has been doing this for 20 years. She has requested a loan to purchase kilos of fish for her business.

Virginia has been a member of PMPC for nine years. In the future, Virginia hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase kilos of fish for her business selling fish.

loans.name: Ma. Shirley

texts.en:
Ma. Shirley works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan.
